ModulePrefs.title: Adult Symptoms Checker
ModulePrefs.description: Get a quick snapshot of your health problems with Symptoms Checker to assess your options. Choose from common symptoms like abdominal pain, cough, dizziness, headaches, pain, vision, and others. This tool will give you a rough idea of the condition you may have. We will continue to add more useful information like medications and costs. We are passionate about health tools to increase exposure and empower patients. Check it out!
ModulePrefs.author: Inventive Gadget

<script>google.load("jquery","1.3.2");</script>

#symptom1 p { margin: 6px 10px 15px 10px; }

#symptom1 label { font: 16px Georgia; color: #757575; margin: 0 0 6px 0; display: block; }
#symptom1 .refine ul { float: left; width: 49%; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
#symptom1 .refine ul li { clear: both; overflow: hidden; line-height: 120%; margin: 0 0 4px 0; list-style: none; padding: 0; }

function doit(cat){
var params = {};
params[gadgets.io.RequestParameters.CONTENT_TYPE] = gadgets.io.ContentType.TEXT;
var allVals = [];
$(':checked').each(function() {
allVals.push($(this).val());
});
var getcat = $('#sym'+cat).text(); 
document.getElementById('category').innerHTML = getcat;
document.getElementById('symptom'+cat).style.display='none';
document.getElementById('details').style.display='block';
document.getElementById('list').innerHTML='<img src="https://iblogbox.github.io/js/img/etc/wait.gif">';
var url = 'http://symptomchecker.flowsoft7.com/gadget/symptomcheck.php?cat='+cat+'&string='+allVals;
gadgets.io.makeRequest(url, callback, params);
};

function callback(obj) {
var response = obj.text;
document.getElementById('list').innerHTML = response;    
setTimeout('gadgets.window.adjustHeight()', 5000);
document.getElementById('frame1').style.display='block';
sendit();      
gadgets.window.adjustHeight();
}


function listsym(condition){
if(condition && condition.indexOf("http://")==0)return;
var params = {};
params[gadgets.io.RequestParameters.CONTENT_TYPE] = gadgets.io.ContentType.TEXT;
params[gadgets.io.RequestParameters.METHOD] = gadgets.io.MethodType.GET;
document.getElementById('listsym').style.display='block';
document.getElementById('listsym').innerHTML='<img src="https://iblogbox.github.io/js/img/etc/wait.gif">';
var url = 'http://symptomchecker.flowsoft7.com/gadget/symptomcheck.php?condition='+ escape(condition);
gadgets.io.makeRequest(url, callback1, params);
};

function callback1(obj) {
function trim(str) {
  	return str.replace(/^\s*|\s*$/g,"");
}
var response = obj.text;
var html = "";
var items = response.split("|");
    for (var i = 0; i < items.length ; i++) {
		if(!trim(items[i]))continue;
      html += "<li>";
      html += items[i]; 
      html += "</li>";
    }
document.getElementById('listsym').innerHTML = html;    
setTimeout('gadgets.window.adjustHeight()', 9000);       
gadgets.window.adjustHeight();
}

function sendit(){
$(document).ready(function(){
	$('#details a').click(function(e){     
        var $target = $(e.target);
        var select = $(this).attr('href');         
        listsym(select);
	});
});
}
